title: Inspired by The Shy, Box Box, BestRivenNA

embed.description: ➥ Help me reach 5,000 subscribers: https://www.youtube.com/user/RazaohLoL?sub_confirmation=1 ►►►Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/RazaohLoL - New Stream!!! ►►►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RazaohLoL Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zOMFGuM5xww Consider SUBSCRIBING for more Content! Please leave your Comments, Suggestions and feedback below :)

body:
Hey Guys, Razaoh here

I´ve created this Montage and put hard work in it to make it not like every other Riven Montage on YT (Please dont feel offended!)

Im Razaoh an Allrounder but Riven Main that was Last Season D5 and tries to Climb to Diamond 5 on the Account (SMURF)  hoazaR (Platinum 4)

I hope you enjoy watching this Video and if you liked it , Like Subscribe or Share for more Content!

I hope i could teach others by this Video (Maybe some new Combos , Stuff)

Thanks for taking your time watching this Video


Regards 

Razaoh/Jason

non penso le due cose siano collegate, penso che la curiosità stia un pò sotto al reale interesse.. per esempio posso essere curioso del funzionamento delle ovaie, ma di sicuro non mi interessa non avendole
